Class FileSystems

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.vipr.client.core.AbstractResources<T>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BulkResources<FileShareRestRep>, Resources<FileShareRestRep>, TaskResources<FileShareRestRep>

    public class FileSystems
extends ProjectResources<FileShareRestRep>
implements TaskResources<FileShareRestRep>
    File Systems resources.

    Base URL: /file/filesystems

        API Call: Post /file/filesystems/{id}/protection/continuous-copies/resume

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the file system.
        Returns:
        a task for monitoring the progress of the operation. *
